WRITING.TITLE: Using side-by-side apparition offensively
WRITING.TEXT: I'm rereading Deathly Hallows for the umpteenth time, and just got to the part where Ron's been splinched due to Hermione's hasty apparition. This got me thinking: Could a wizard kill someone by purposefully splinching their head off via apparating with them?

Missing scene from Deathly Hallows Part 1
WRITING.TEXT: In the book when Scrimgeor explains Dumbledore's will, there's a part where he asks Hermione if she seeks work in magical law, to which she replies "no, I want to do some good in this world". I vividly remember this was in the movie, as people in the theater laughed and clapped, and since then I've watched the movie many times. And yet when I watched it again today, that scene was nowhere to be found.

WRITING.TITLE: How would the story end had Harry not disarmed Draco?
We have Bash, why not Smash?
Where are out Infinity War sins?!
Why can't you leave a fentanyl transdermal patch for longer than 72 hours?
WRITING.TEXT: Let's forget for a second that the patch can take up to 24 hours to take effect, effectively making ita 48 hour patch; let's talk numbers. For instance, the 50mcg/hour patch contains 8.25mg of fentanyl. But if you take 50mcg and multiply it by 72, you get 3.6mg. So what the hell is all that extra fentanyl doing there? Why not leave it for 6-7 days in order to get your full patch's worth? What am I missing here?

WRITING.TITLE: I'll legit be surprised if we don't get something similar
In the Battle of Hogwarts, how come Voldemort's spells didn't backfire?
WRITING.TEXT: Harry explained to Vodlemort that the reason his spells couldn't hurt the good guys was because he died willingly for them, as his mother did for him. But when his mother did it, Voldemort's first spell backfired. How come his spells didn't during the Battle of Hogwarts? Edit: You don't know the answer to a question so you downvote it? :/

WRITING.TITLE: Can exercise save you from freezing?
Fear of escalators... But only when going up
WRITING.TEXT: I'm 30, and up until 3 years ago I had no problem what so ever with escalators. But now I do, even though I never even came close to tripping. And I've no problem going down, and even when I go up I don't get scared until the very last stretch when I need to step off them. I get this irrational fear I'd fall. What gives? And is there anything I can do to combat this fear?

WRITING.TITLE: Injecting oxy syrup (Oxycod)
WRITING.TEXT: Tried googling, but I guess oxy syrup isn't a thing in most countries? It's basically a fruit flavored solution meant for drinking. It has 2mg of oxycodone per 1ml. Can you just inject that? Surely it wouldn't be as bad for you as injecting pills? Here's a list of inactive ingredients: Sorbitol, ethanol, saccharin sodium, citric acid, sodium benzoate, tutti frutti flavor, azorubin, purified water.

WRITING.TITLE: Can you cook a mylan fentnayl patch into a snortable powder?
WRITING.TEXT: Yeah yeah, I know this ROA severely limits the bioavailability, but it's also much safer than IVing. And hell, a powder can easily be converted into an injectable solution anyway. But is there a way to do it? I'm not sure if mylan patches use HCL fentanyl, and if they don't then everything would probably boil away into steam.

WRITING.TITLE: The fictional child of Thor amp; Gamora vs. the fictional child of Aquaman and Wonder Woman (MCU amp; DCEU)
WRITING.TEXT: Both children would be raised and trained by their parents, and must fight to the death when they turn 20. Who wins?

WRITING.TITLE: Overload your opponent!
Can I make a nasal spray from an injectable solution made from fentanyl patches?
WRITING.TEXT: Here's what I'm thinking: * Cook a patch with the method from [this](http://www.aivl.org.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/05/Injecting-Fentanyl-Minimising-The-Risks.pdf) guide. * Mix it with saline and put that solution in a nasal sprayer. Would that work? Yes, I realize I'll be losing a lot of bioavailability, but I don't do needles. And wearing it didn't anything for me, smoking it feels like ruining it (tried, I'm a noob) and gumming it wasn't all that great for me either.

WRITING.TITLE: Just IM'd 500ug fentanyl
WRITING.TEXT: I cooked a patch strip with citric acid, resulting in a solution of 2.5ml which I filtered, then added 2.5ml saline and IM'd it into my upper arm (where you get vaccines). It was 15 minutes ago and already started taking effect. Af first my entire arm was hurt and sore like a mother, but now.... it's actually nice. I have an inkling that the reason it's no longer hurting and sore was due to fent's analgesic properties. Either way, I'm feeling nice and warm and itchy (but not too itchy). Overall not a bad experience. I still have an entire 50ug/h patch (containing 8.25mg fent) which I intend to cook with citric acid, mix with saline and pour it into a nasal sprayer. Will definitely update you guys.

WRITING.TITLE: Quantum theroy is the most tantalizing "evidence" that we're living in a simulation
WRITING.TEXT: Think about it: Isn't it odd how we can't know an atom's spin or velocity until we observe it? It's kind of like it's... rendering. Either way, it's a good way to save on computing power. Then there's quantum entanglement, which doesn't make any sense from our limited perspective. Finally, the fact that atoms are made out of 99.99% empty space also alludes to some form of power saving. And don't even get me started on dark matter and dark energy.

WRITING.TITLE: The yin to Kinsbane's yang... kinda

WRITING.TITLE: Who's the strongest character a Composite Human can defeat?
WRITING.TEXT: If you don't know the term, then a composite human is basically: * CH (Composite Human) is a single intesex person, 30 years of age, at peak human everything. * CH is as strong as the strongest human to ever live, as fast as the fastest human, as skilled, as perceptive, etc. * CH is as intelligent as the most intelligent person that ever lived, plus CH has access to the enitrety of human knowledge right in the brain. * In short: No single human could ever defeat CH at boxing, or at martial arts, or at weight lifting, running, jumping, etc. Also no single human could ever defeat CH at chess, or at hacking, or marksmanship, reflexes, logic, deduction, etc. #Round 1: Random Encounter. #Round 2: CH gets 24 hours of prep time. Opponent doesn't. #Round 3: CH gets 1 year of prep time. Opponent only gets a 24 hours heads up.

WRITING.TITLE: What's more deadly gram to gram- Lofentanil or botulinum toxin?
Can't believe there isn't a card named Aftershock
Why do people chain smoke?
WRITING.TEXT: Apparently nicotine stays in your system anywhere between 40 minutes to 2 hours, so what's the point of chain smoking? I'm not talking about people who just got super anxious about something nor about drinkers (as alcohol prevents some of the nicotine from getting to the brain). Just regular chain smokers.

WRITING.TITLE: This season is even faker than the last :(
WRITING.TEXT: What kid would voluntarily admit to doing something wrong even if they actually did it? Let alone if they didn't. Even if the "participators" aren't actors themselves (which they are) that right there would have thrown the whole test out of the window. Normal, free vsauce1 videos are a million times better than this. And Michael hasn't been doing them for over a year, all for Mind Field which is almost as fake as reality TV. Shame. P.S. Even if the show is real, normal vsauce videos are still better.
